details: Diagnosed root cause after 5+ failed attempts
Identified path mismatch: components using /images-optimized/ but files in /images/
Fixed licensing-credentials.njk to use correct /images/ paths
Fixed air-duct-cleaning.njk to use correct /images/ paths
Verified insulation applications and accreditations were already working
All website images now displaying correctly

issues_resolved: Spray Foam Insurance logo not displaying
Air duct cleaning background image not visible
Path mismatch between components and image directories
insights: Both /images/ and /images-optimized/ directories exist and are copied by eleventy
Optimized images were moved to /images/ directory but components weren't updated
Simple path fixes resolved all remaining image display issues
Important to verify actual file locations when debugging image display problems
next_actions: Consider consolidating image directories to avoid future confusion
Update any remaining components that might reference /images-optimized/
Document the correct image path convention for future development
